data.text: Suzuka-saaan!!
data.name: Special Week

data.text: …fufuu!
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Suzuka-san!! You were suuuuuuuper cool out there!!
data.name: Special Week

data.text: Thanks, Spe-chan.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Really, you've shown us such an absurd running-style. 
You're even making us want to take off running like that.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: You said it…
data.name: Air Groove

data.text: But, we won't let you pull ahead by youself just like this.
data.name: Air Groove

data.text:
I'm also overflowing with excitement and emotion!! 
Absolutely, I want to run together with Suzuka-san again!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru

data.text: Well well, you have definitely shown me something very exciting.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: Tachyon…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Today's run will, without a doubt, push "Uma Musume" 
to the next stage. I have a hunch that it'll become 
an important historical event.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Suzuka-kun and Trainer, you two are truly 
the ideal research materials.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: Research materials… eh? Research…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
From now on, we'll show you even more of the 
"Uma Musume" Silence Suzuka continuing to chase her "scenery".
data.name: <username>

data.text: Fufuu… how reliable of you two.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
so we can't stand here all day.
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
so we can't stand here all day.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Yeah, you're right.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
…Everyone, thank you for your support. 
While I was running, I could hear all of your voices.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: And, Trainer-san's voice too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
And you've done more than responded to that-
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
And you've done more than responded to that-
data.name: <username>

data.text: Fufuu… Yes, I've returned.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Well then everyone, we'll have to continue this talk later.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Hmmm… being called research materials, 
she does not seem to like that.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Well, it is not as if it really matters what I call 
her. But if it seems to bother her, then…
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text:
Suzuka-kun is, the "dream" of many Uma Musume and people- 
How does that sound?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

data.text: Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.
data.name: <username>

data.text: Suzukaaa! Thanks for the awesome race!
data.name: Spectator A

data.text: From now on, show us more of that running!
data.name: Spectator B

data.text:
Thank you very much. 
Everyone's cheers, gave me the gentle push I needed.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
From now on, for the sake of continuing to see a lot more 
"scenery" I will continue running… and-
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: I'll continue to show everyone the "scenery" that I see…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
